insert into divided (releaseId, inputName, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal) values (#{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifdivided,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iflatest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update divided set releaseId = #{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputName = #{inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algName1 = #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algName2 = #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifDivided = #{ifdivided,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score1 = #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score2 = #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifLatest = #{iflatest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, winAlgname = #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifFinal = #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dividedId = #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dividedId, releaseId, inputName, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal from divided where dividedId = #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select dividedId, releaseId, inputName, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal from divided
select ifDivided from divided where dividedId = #{dividedid}
mapper.update: update divided SET ifDivided = #{param1} where dividedId = #{param2}
